title: Burundi Cancer Care Needs: A call to action.
abstract: Burundi is a landlocked country in the East central African region. Beyond a long civil war strife, cancer care remains overlooked, both in terms of infrastructure and human resources needs, and it shows from estimated globlal incidence and mortality figures. Through a focused literature search, this study highlights the main cance care needs in this country, with the aim to gather global oncology support to Burundi. IMPLICATIONS FOR PRACTICE: There is little knowledge about the state of Oncology in Burundi. This article, based on a literature search depicts the image of the current state of cancer care in Burundi and aims to compel global health enthusiasts in joining in curbing the death toll of cancers in Burundi.
authors: Manirakiza, A; Rubagumya, F; Ngendahayo, L
